snippet: Representative Paul D. Ryan received a raucous baptism into public speaking as the vice-presidential candidate, Iowa State Fair-style, when he encountered determined hecklers on his first day of solo campaigning.
abstract: Representative Paul D. Ryan received a raucous baptism into public speaking as the vice-presidential candidate, Iowa State Fair-style, when he encountered determined hecklers on his first day of solo campaigning.

headline.main: Ryan Greeted by Hecklers at Iowa State Fair
